# endAudio()

**Instance Method**

Marks the end of audio input for the recognition request.

## Declaration

```swift
func endAudio()
```

## Discussion

Call this method explicitly to let the speech recognizer know that no more audio input is coming.

## Appending Audio Buffers

- **append(_:)**: Appends audio in the PCM format to the end of the recognition request.
- **appendAudioSampleBuffer(_:)**: Appends audio to the end of the recognition request.
